name: Plump Pop
overview:
Plump Pop was produced by Taito in 1987.

Plump Pop is a Circus variant. Players can choose to play as a team of dogs, cats, or pigs as they bounce another one of their kind on a trampoline in order to pop balloons.

The game features 10 rounds made up of 4 parts each for a total of 40 levels with every third part being a bonus round where the player tries to catch as many falling fruits as they can with their trampoline and every 4th part being a boss battle. During the main rounds players can earn power-ups that can do things like increase the damage being dealt or increase the size of the trampoline.
